title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 383 - Regulations For Low-level Radioactive Waste Disposal Facilities Financial Assurance Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 383 - Regulations For Low-level Radioactive Waste Disposal Facilities Financial Assurance Requirements

State Regulations

Subpart 383-1 - General Provisions (§ 383-1.1 to 383-1.9)

Subpart 383-2 - Definitions (§ 383-2.1)

Subpart 383-3 - Permits to Construct and Operate a Land Disposal Facility (§ 383-3.1 to 383-3.13)

Subpart 383-4 - Permit Modification for Facility Closure and Post-Closure Observation and Maintenance (§ 383-4.1 to 383-4.6)

Subpart 383-5 - Permit Modification for Institutional Control (§ 383-5.1 to 383-5.6)

Subpart 383-6 - Radioactive Waste Land Disposal Facilities Financial Assurance Requirements (§ 383-6.1 to 383-6.13)

Subpart 383-7 - Requirements for Design and Construction of Land Disposal Facilities (§ 383-7.1 to 383-7.7)

Subpart 383-8 - Requirements for Operation of Land Disposal Facilities (§ 383-8.1 to 383-8.10)

Subpart 383-9 - Closure, Post-Closure, and Institutional Control Requirements for Land Disposal Facilities (§ 383-9.1 to 383-9.9)

Subpart 383-10 - Requirements for Environmental Structural Monitoring (§ 383-10.1 to 383-10.8)

Subpart 383-11 - Land Survey and Marking Requirements (§ 383-11.1 to 383-11.4)

Subpart 383-12 - Emergency Response and Action Level Response Plans (§ 383-12.1 to 383-12.7)

Subpart 383-13 - Records, Reports and Public Information (§ 383-13.1 to 383-13.5)

Subpart 383-14 - Security (§ 383-14.1 to 383-14.3)

Subpart 383-15 - On-Site Environmental Monitors (§ 383-15.1 to 383-15.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 383

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, arts. 3, 17, 19, 27, 29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
